data.name: The Evil Farming Game: Replanted
data.detailed_description:
All screenshots are of alpha builds, and are subject to change.

What have you gotten yourself into now?


When Richard, the town farmer, finds himself at the center of his wife's murder, it's up to him (you) to figure out what the hell to do.


You live on a small island village, with friendly people, law enforcement, and your wife.
Everyday starts the same, harvest yesterday's crops, give them to your wife, and plant some more. Forever and ever, maybe sometimes you head to the market to pick up some tools.
But one day, that all changed, late at night, you lash out at your wife, and kill her. As you feel her pulse stop, you have no idea what to do. Will you turn yourself in? Or will you hide, stealthily avoiding punishment.
Make your choice in the First Part of this 2 game duology.

Meet friendly faces! Make friends, make enemies! Make your own story. With endless possibility to how your scheme will end up, there is no way you'll make it out of this scot-free, as you'll have more than just your wife, taken away from you.

Replanted is primarily based on the "Evil Farming Game" myth.

data.short_description: What will you do when you, an ordinary farmer, end up in a situation where your wife is laying on the floor, lifeless. Will you turn yourself in? Or hide from punishment. Make your choice in part one of this two game duology.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (any should work)
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Just, fucking any of them.
  • Additional Notes: these specs are for 60fps at 1080p. Running the game anywhere below 60fps will break the game. When using steam controller or steam deck, use only the buttons and thumbsticks.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 9000
  • Processor: Ryzen Threadripper 9990x
  • Memory: 25000 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia PTX9090Ti SUPER
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100000 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that include Smell-O-Vision
  • Additional Notes: Isn't needed to run the game, but I would recommend this setup to anyone.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.10 or better. Not Supported: 11.0 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (any should work)
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are again for 1080p at 60fps. Only works on Macs capable of 32bit applications
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.10 or better. Not Supported: 11.0 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Additional Notes: This is the setup used to run the game on MacOS.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains realistic depictions of domestic violence, and murder. References to drug usage. Crude language. Realistic corpses. And extreme horror elements.
